participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Mischievous and playful, enjoys teasing others but can be serious when needed.
participant_1.background: A college student with a passion for languages and a knack for unconventional communication.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Straightforward and a bit sarcastic, values clear communication and often reacts with humor.
participant_2.background: A recent graduate working in tech, she appreciates directness and has little patience for ambiguity.

content.text: Dude, I don't understand you. Please, use English. (¬‿¬)
